
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/grey-wolf/p/18772476" title="发布于 2025-03-14 17:16">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">linux中如何判断一个rpm是手动安装还是通过yum安装的</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h1 id="现状">现状</h1>
<p>对于一个不熟悉的服务器或者是虽然是自己的服务器，但历史比较久远，对于上面安装了的一些软件包，我们记忆都慢慢模糊了。</p>
<p>我今天遇到一个情况，在安装一个工具x2openEuler时，安装失败，提示依赖冲突：</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell">[root@VM-0-6-centos x2openeuler]# yum install x2openEuler-core-3.0.0-20250104.x86_64.rpm 
...

</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://dump-1252523945.cos.ap-shanghai.myqcloud.com/img/image-20250314142605547.png" alt="image-20250314142605547" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://dump-1252523945.cos.ap-shanghai.myqcloud.com/img/image-20250314142629918.png" alt="image-20250314142629918" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>我在网上都没发现别人有遇到这个问题，后面咨询了下ai，说可能是因为系统里安装了mysql的原因，这个工具会在系统中安装mariadb-server，安装时检查依赖，就发现和系统中的mysql有冲突。</p>
<h1 id="判断mysql是源码安装还是rpm">判断mysql是源码安装还是rpm</h1>
<p>在linux中，一个软件可能有多种安装方式。</p>
<ul>
<li>源码编译安装</li>
<li>网上下载rpm，上传到服务器上rpm -ivh安装</li>
<li>yum方式安装</li>
</ul>
<p>如果要卸载这个冲突的mysql，首先还得知道，当初是怎么安装的。</p>
<p>我先通过rpm查询，判断是通过rpm安装的，还是源码编译安装的。</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell">[root@VM-0-6-centos x2openeuler]# rpm -qa |grep mysql
mysql-community-common-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64
mysql-community-libs-compat-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64
zabbix-server-mysql-5.0.18-1.el7.x86_64
mysql-community-libs-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64
mysql-community-server-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64
rh-php72-php-mysqlnd-7.2.24-1.el7.x86_64
zabbix-web-mysql-scl-5.0.18-1.el7.noarch
mysql57-community-release-el7-9.noarch
mysql-community-client-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64
</code></pre>
<p>输出有结果，那就是rpm方式安装的。</p>
<p>下面这个命令，还可以看到时间。</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell">[root@VM-0-6-centos x2openeuler]# rpm -qa --last|grep mysql
zabbix-web-mysql-scl-5.0.18-1.el7.noarch      Sat 18 Dec 2021 04:16:33 PM CST
rh-php72-php-mysqlnd-7.2.24-1.el7.x86_64      Sat 18 Dec 2021 04:16:31 PM CST
zabbix-server-mysql-5.0.18-1.el7.x86_64       Sat 18 Dec 2021 04:11:05 PM CST
mysql-community-libs-compat-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64 Sun 28 Nov 2021 02:15:46 PM CST
mysql-community-server-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64    Sun 28 Nov 2021 02:15:45 PM CST
mysql-community-client-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64    Sun 28 Nov 2021 02:15:24 PM CST
mysql-community-libs-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64      Sun 28 Nov 2021 02:15:21 PM CST
mysql-community-common-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64    Sun 28 Nov 2021 02:15:21 PM CST
mysql57-community-release-el7-9.noarch        Sun 28 Nov 2021 02:12:07 PM CST
</code></pre>
<p>接下来的问题是，这些rpm是直接通过从网上下载了rpm包并上传，然后执行<code>rpm -ivh</code>安装呢，还是通过yum install的方式安装的呢？</p>
<h1 id="判断是rpm-ivh还是yum安装">判断是rpm ivh还是yum安装</h1>
<h2 id="方法1">方法1</h2>
<p>我在以前发现了如下命令：</p>
<p>yum history</p>
<p><img src="https://dump-1252523945.cos.ap-shanghai.myqcloud.com/img/image-20250314143302168.png" alt="image-20250314143302168" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>这个命令，可以看到最近的20条yum安装，但是20条之外的，就看不到了。</p>
<p>如果你想看到20条之外的，可以使用如下命令：</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell">yum history list all
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://dump-1252523945.cos.ap-shanghai.myqcloud.com/img/image-20250314143943305.png" alt="image-20250314143943305" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>这次，可以显示这个服务器的所有记录了。但是，你们可能发现了，第二列那里，竟然显示的是root啥的，不是具体的安装命令了。</p>
<p>不要着急，修改下如下配置：</p>
<p><a href="https://serverfault.com/questions/851717/yum-how-to-show-command-line-column-in-yum-history-list-all-output" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://serverfault.com/questions/851717/yum-how-to-show-command-line-column-in-yum-history-list-all-output</a></p>
<pre><code class="language-shell"># edit file "/etc/yum.conf" ==&gt;&gt;&gt; and add this line somewhere in it
# 修改 /etc/yum.conf，增加如下行
history_list_view=cmds
</code></pre>
<p>然后重新执行，就正常了。如果只是临时生效，可以：</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell">sudo yum --setopt=history_list_view=commands history list all

</code></pre>
<p>我这边搜了下mysql相关的，果然找到了，应该是第二条，第一行是这个yum事务的id，为56：</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell">[root@VM-0-6-centos x2openeuler]# yum history list all |grep mysql
    59 | install zabbix-web-mysql | 2021-12-18 16:16 | Install        |   33 &gt; 
    56 | install mysql-server     | 2021-11-28 14:15 | I, O           |    6 &gt;&lt;
</code></pre>
<p>接下来，就看下这个56号事务的详情：</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell"> yum history info 56
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://dump-1252523945.cos.ap-shanghai.myqcloud.com/img/image-20250314144524246.png" alt="image-20250314144524246" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>现在就确定了，就是这个事务，安装了mysql。</p>
<h2 id="方法2">方法2</h2>
<p>我们也可以通过其他命令，来找到对应的事务id。</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell">[root@VM-0-6-centos x2openeuler]# yum history package-list \*mysql\*
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://dump-1252523945.cos.ap-shanghai.myqcloud.com/img/image-20250314144810158.png" alt="image-20250314144810158" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>这里看到一个数字为56，我们通过查看<code> yum history info 56</code>，确定了就是这个事务id。</p>
<h1 id="通过事务id回滚对应的安装">通过事务id，回滚对应的安装</h1>
<pre><code class="language-shell">yum history undo 事务id
</code></pre>
<p>结果我这里不知道为啥，卸载失败了:</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell">[root@VM-0-6-centos x2openeuler]# yum history undo 56
Undoing transaction 56, from Sun Nov 28 14:15:20 2021
    Obsoleted   mariadb-libs-1:5.5.65-1.el7.x86_64              @os
    Dep-Install mysql-community-client-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64      @mysql57-community
    Dep-Install mysql-community-common-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64      @mysql57-community
    Obsoleting  mysql-community-libs-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64        @mysql57-community
    Obsoleting  mysql-community-libs-compat-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64 @mysql57-community
    Install     mysql-community-server-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64      @mysql57-community
Error: No package(s) available to install
</code></pre>
<p>还是手动卸载吧：</p>
<pre><code class="language-shell">rpm -e mysql-community-server-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64
rpm -e mysql-community-client-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64
rpm -e mysql-community-libs-compat-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64
rpm -e mysql-community-libs-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64
rpm -e mysql-community-common-5.7.36-1.el7.x86_64
</code></pre>
<p>可参考：<a href="https://docs.redhat.com/en/documentation/red_hat_enterprise_linux/6/html/deployment_guide/sec2-yum-transaction_history-reverting#sec2-Yum-Transaction_History-Reverting" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://docs.redhat.com/en/documentation/red_hat_enterprise_linux/6/html/deployment_guide/sec2-yum-transaction_history-reverting#sec2-Yum-Transaction_History-Reverting</a></p>
<h1 id="参考文档">参考文档</h1>
<p><a href="https://docs.redhat.com/en/documentation/red_hat_enterprise_linux/6/html/deployment_guide/sec-yum-transaction_history#sec2-Yum-Transaction_History-Listing" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://docs.redhat.com/en/documentation/red_hat_enterprise_linux/6/html/deployment_guide/sec-yum-transaction_history#sec2-Yum-Transaction_History-Listing</a></p>
<p><a href="https://serverfault.com/questions/851717/yum-how-to-show-command-line-column-in-yum-history-list-all-output" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://serverfault.com/questions/851717/yum-how-to-show-command-line-column-in-yum-history-list-all-output</a></p>

</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
